What method should I use to implement a preview function in a CMS?

I've got an API like this:

   GET /someresource
   return 200 with the latest version of the resource

   POST /someresource [content] 
   create a new version of /someresource with the specificed content.
   return 201 with the new version subsidiary resource, 
   eg: /someresource/0.11

But what if I want to have a preview of the content before I commit
it?

Right now I've got:

   POST /someresource?preview [content]
   return 200 with what the resource would look like

But I'm unsure if this is right. POST should imply some
representational state transfer and this is not state transfer. It's
just look ahead to state transfer.

   GET /somresource?preview

is no good because I can't send the content.

Any thoughts?
